languages.text:
"Как ни старал{mf|ся|ась} эттфатер, узреть{mf| он|} не мог{mf||ла}
Слабости в крепкой броне злого духа.

"No matter how the Aett-Vater tried,
no weakness could {mf|he|she} spy
in the evil spirit's stout armour.
languages.original_text:
"Как ни старал{mf|ся|ась} эттфатер, узреть{mf| он|} не мог{mf||ла}
Слабости в крепкой броне злого духа.

traits.locale_text:
"No matter how the Aett-Vater tried,
no weakness could {mf|he|she} spy
in the evil spirit's stout armour.

"No matter how the Aett-Vater tried,
no weakness could {mf|he|she} spy

"Как ни старал{mf|ся|ась} эттфатер, узреть{mf| он|} не мог{mf||ла}
Слабости в крепкой броне злого духа.

languages.text:
「アエット＝ヴァテルがどうあがいても
悪霊の頑丈な鎧の前では
弱点を見抜けなかった。
languages.original_text:
"No matter how the Aett-Vater tried,
no weakness could {mf|he|she} spy
in the evil spirit's stout armour.

traits.locale_text:
「アエット＝ヴァテルがどうあがいても
悪霊の頑丈な鎧の前では
弱点を見抜けなかった。

languages.text:
“狼领使尽浑身解数，
也无法找到邪灵，
那坚韧铠甲的半分弱点。”
languages.original_text:
"No matter how the Aett-Vater tried,
no weakness could {mf|he|she} spy
in the evil spirit's stout armour.

traits.locale_text:
“狼领使尽浑身解数，
也无法找到邪灵，
那坚韧铠甲的半分弱点。”

languages.text:
« Nulle faiblesse l'aett-vater
ne parvint à découvrir
dans la robuste armure
de l'esprit maléfique. »
languages.original_text:
"No matter how the Aett-Vater tried,
no weakness could {mf|he|she} spy
in the evil spirit's stout armour.

traits.locale_text:
« Nulle faiblesse l'aett-vater
ne parvint à découvrir
dans la robuste armure
de l'esprit maléfique. »

languages.text:
«Por más que {mf|el|la} Aett-Vater lo intentaba,
ninguna debilidad pudo encontrar
en la armadura imbatible del villano».
languages.original_text:
"No matter how the Aett-Vater tried,
no weakness could {mf|he|she} spy
in the evil spirit's stout armour.

traits.locale_text:
«Por más que {mf|el|la} Aett-Vater lo intentaba,
ninguna debilidad pudo encontrar
en la armadura imbatible del villano».

languages.text:
"So sehr der Aett-Vater es auch versuchte,
keine Schwäche konnte {mf|er|sie} erkennen
in der starken Rüstung des bösen Geists.
languages.original_text:
"No matter how the Aett-Vater tried,
no weakness could {mf|he|she} spy
in the evil spirit's stout armour.

traits.locale_text:
"So sehr der Aett-Vater es auch versuchte,
keine Schwäche konnte {mf|er|sie} erkennen
in der starken Rüstung des bösen Geists.

languages.text:
"Aett-Vater ne kadar denediyse de
Kötü ruhun sağlam zırhında
Zayıf bir nokta bulamadı.
languages.original_text:
"No matter how the Aett-Vater tried,
no weakness could {mf|he|she} spy
in the evil spirit's stout armour.

traits.locale_text:
"Aett-Vater ne kadar denediyse de
hiç zayıflık bulamadı
kötü ruhun sağlam zırhında.
